snippet: Antigovernment activists said at least 20 Druse were killed on Wednesday night in Idlib Province, fueling fears for civilians and minority sects in the tumultuous region.
abstract: Nusra Front militants reportedly kill 20 members of Syria's Druse minority sect, inciting fear among residents.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad and Maher Samaan contributed reporting from Beirut, and an employee of The New York Times from Damascus, Syria.

lead_paragraph: Antigovernment activists said at least 20 Druse were killed on Wednesday night in Idlib Province, fueling fears for civilians and minority sects in the tumultuous region.

headline.main: Syrian Druse Reconsider Alliances After Deadly Attack
headline.print_headline: Druse Weigh Alliances After Attack in Syria
